function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close proximity and interaction with various individuals during the podcast project.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission due to close contact.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols, social distancing, and use of personal protective equipment.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection, and contactless technology for equipment handling.","People":"Participants, producers, and collaborators involved in the podcast project.","Owner":"Project organizers and health and safety coordinators."}]}
